description: This table will contain all of the differential diagnosis entries for a particular encounter.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the differential diagnosis associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. The digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DIFF_DX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the diagnosis that is associated with this differential diagnosis.

columns.name: DIFF_DX_DESC
columns.description: The text description of the differential diagnosis.

columns.name: DIFF_DX_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category number of the qualifier for the differential diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DIFF_DX_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category number of the status for the differential diagnosis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Final


In Progress


Ruled Out


Inconclusive

columns.name: DIFF_DX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment for the differential diagnosis entered by the user.

columns.name: DIFF_DX_UNIQUE
columns.description: The unique identifier associated with this differential diagnosis that is used to distinguish between other diagnosis entries.

columns.name: DIFF_CHRONIC_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the differential diagnosis is chronic.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DDX_LINK_PROB_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the problem used to create the differential diagnosis.
